notes: Build @town_center/Towncenter_aoe2DE.png@ as soon as possible next to @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@, with 2 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@.
The other @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ builds a @dock/Dock_aoe2de.png@ (water on the edge, next to @animal/AoE2_DE_shore_fish_icon.png@).
After @dock/Dock_aoe2de.png@, this last @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ builds a @other/House_aoe2DE.png@, then gathers @animal/AoE2_DE_shore_fish_icon.png@.
Once @town_center/Towncenter_aoe2DE.png@ is done, send the first @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ to @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@.
Build a @dock/FishingShipDE.png@ when you can, then send @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ on @animal/Sheep_aoe2DE.png@ (keep 2 on @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@).
Force drop @resource/Aoe2de_food.png@ and build @other/House_aoe2DE.png@ when needed.
When you have 5 @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ on @animal/Sheep_aoe2DE.png@, send the others to @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@.
Move @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ from @animal/Sheep_aoe2DE.png@ to @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@, while maintaining @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ production.
Send next @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ to @animal/Sheep_aoe2DE.png@ and @animal/Boar_aoe2DE.png@ (6 stay on @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@).
When needed, build @other/House_aoe2DE.png@ close to @town_center/Towncenter_aoe2DE.png@. Produce @dock/FishingShipDE.png@.
Build a @lumber_camp/Lumber_camp_aoe2de.png@ before aging up. Add @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ to @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@.
Balance @resource/Aoe2de_food.png@ and @resource/Aoe2de_wood.png@. Build a second @dock/Dock_aoe2de.png@ (space them).
Research @lumber_camp/DoubleBitAxe_aoe2DE.png@, and queue a few @dock/Fire_galley_aoe2DE.png@. Fight for water.
The @resource/MaleVillDE.jpg@ from @dock/Dock_aoe2de.png@ is responsible for @other/House_aoe2DE.png@ and @animal/AoE2_DE_shore_fish_icon.png@.
Look for resources to @mill/Mill_aoe2de.png@ or for extra @animal/Boar_aoe2DE.png@.
